snippet: The Pakistan Cricket Board will review the life ban for match fixing imposed on the country's former captain Saleem Malik on the recommendation of a judicial inquiry commission, PCB chairman Najam Sethi said on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Pakistan Cricket Board to Review Saleem Malik's Life Ban
headline.main: Pakistan Cricket Board to Review Saleem Malik's Life Ban

lead_paragraph: The Pakistan Cricket Board will review the life ban for match fixing imposed on the country's former captain Saleem Malik on the recommendation of a judicial inquiry commission, PCB chairman Najam Sethi said on Tuesday.
